name: NSDistantObject
desc: A proxy for objects in other applications or threads.

items.name: + proxyWithLocal:connection:
items.desc: Returns a local proxy for a given object and connection, creating the proxy if necessary.

items.name: - initWithLocal:connection:
items.desc: Initializes an NSDistantObject object as a local proxy for a given object.

items.name: + proxyWithTarget:connection:
items.desc: Returns a remote proxy for a given object and connection, creating the proxy if necessary.

items.name: - initWithTarget:connection:
items.desc: Initializes a newly allocated NSDistantObject as a remote proxy for remoteObject, which is an id in another thread or another applicationâ€™s address space.

items.name: - setProtocolForProxy:
items.desc: Sets the methods known to be handled by the receiver to those in a given protocol.
